column5: Private room with shared guest bath in a 4BR house located in a quiet neighborhood just off Mopac. You'll be near the Domain and Arboretum with easy access to major highways and only 15 minutes to downtown Austin and 20 minutes to ABIA. Bus stops and train station are within walking distance. Ample parking in the driveway and on the street.  Enjoy watching TV in a fully furnished living room or cooking in an updated kitchen. You can also grill on the backyard patio. Patio is 420-friendly.
